original_title: SL Rupee continues to depreciate against USD
original_body_lines: The Sri Lankan Rupee (LKR) has depreciated further against the US Dollar (USD) today compared to last week, according to the Central Bank of Sri Lanka.
Accordingly, today's buying rate of USD is Rs 304.02 while the selling rate is Rs. 318.23.
Last Friday's buying rate of USD was Rs. 302.64 while the selling rate was Rs. 317.09.
